scripts.test: export $(xargs < .env) && NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' BASE_URL='127.0.0.1:8080' jest --detectOpenHandles --forceExit; cat .env | grep -v '^#' | xargs -I{} sh -c 'unset $(echo {} | cut -d '=' -f1)'
scripts.test:integration: export $(xargs < .env) && NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' BASE_URL='127.0.0.1:8080' jest --testPathPatterns=test/integration --detectOpenHandles --forceExit; cat .env | grep -v '^#' | xargs -I{} sh -c 'unset $(echo {} | cut -d '=' -f1)'
